page.title: 05HOUSING
page.content: The Green, the oldest housing in the village is round the green.Many houses are Georgian or even earlier and they are built of hand made bricks.We could see from some of the ends of the houses that they had been altered and made higher and stone material had the earliest parts.Many roofs were old tiles with stone coping slabs,a few had slates.These houses were farm houses or cottages.Not many houses were built in the Victorian age,though some earlier ones were probably altered.The pub is 18th century.More than half of the village has been built since 1930.Many houses have been built in the post_war period 1945_1985.These are modern brick with red tile roofs.They are built along the roads and lanes.The church and one house are made of stone.
